text: Ntimuzarongore ababangikanyamana keretse babanje kwemera (Allah), kandi rwose umuja w’umwemera umubangikanyamanakazi aruta (ufite ubwigenge) n’ubwo yaba abashimisha (mu bwiza). Ndetse ntimuzashyingire ababangikanyamana keretse babanje kwemera, kandi rwose umucakara w’umwemera aruta umubangikanyamanan’ubwo yaba abashimisha (mu bwiza). Abo (ababangikanyamana) bahamagarira kugana umuriro, agahamagarira naho kugana ijuru Allah no kubabarirwa ibyaha ku bushake bwe, anasobanurira abantu amategeko ye kugira ngo bibuke
